title: Topic 003 Question 019
body: You have a connected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You need to create a custom role-based access control (RBAC) role that meets the following requirements:
•	Enables users to create, read, update, and delete objects in the Default Provider Sub-scription.
The solution must minimize administrative effort.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
